maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Here we are.
This cave will directly lead to Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Эта пещера приведёт напрямую к Пустоши Вермиллион.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: It really is here...
A whole new area of the playground!
This is exciting!!
Now, this is the last chance for everyone to prepare!
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Сейчас последний шанс для всех подготовиться!

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Once we go through here, there is no turning back!
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Как только мы войдём, пути назад уже не будет!

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: We will have to act quickly to catch Sidwell by surprise!
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Нам придётся действовать быстро, чтобы застать Сидвелла врасплох!

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Lea, please enter the cave once you feel ready to start.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Лея, пожалуйста, войди в пещеру, как только будешь готова.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: [nods]
This is your last chance to prepare. When ready, enter the cave in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge - Hidden Entrance\c[0]
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Это ваш последний шанс подготовиться. Когда будете готовы, войдите в пещеру в \c[3]Сапфировом крае - Скрытый проход\c[0]

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: This is it, Lea.
If we go through that tunnel, we will reach \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Если мы пройдём через тоннель, то достигнем \c[3]Пустоши Вермиллион\c[0].

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Lukas...\. the Evotar of him...\. he is hopefully still over there.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Лукас...\. его эвотар...\. надеюсь, он ещё там.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: If we act fast enough, we might still be able to rescue him.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Если мы будем действовать быстро, то, возможно, всё ещё сможем спасти его.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Lea!
Lea, please stop.
Running in there alone and unprepared is destined to fail.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Бежать туда одной и неподготовленной обречено на провал.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Do not worry.
I am pretty positive that we will find a way to reach the Evotar server.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Я уверен, что мы найдём способ добраться до сервера эвотаров.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: To be honest... I am more concerned about what comes afterwards.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Если честно... меня больше волнует то, что будет потом.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Why?
Assuming that we reach the server and manage to make a backup of all the Evotars...
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Если предположить, что мы достигнем сервера и сможем сделать резервную копию всех эвотаров...

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: We still need a proper environment to run them.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Мы по-прежнему нуждаемся в нужной среде, чтобы запустить их.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: A new place for Evotars.
And one way or another, we need Instatainment's permission for that.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: И так или иначе, нам нужно разрешение Instatainment для этого.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: I am not entirely sure how to tackle this issue, yet.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Я ещё не совсем уверен, как решить эту проблему.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Even for an employee like me, it is difficult to reach the right people to talk to about this.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Даже для такого сотрудника, как я, трудно найти нужных людей, с которыми можно поговорить об этом.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Well, that certainly dampened the mood, I am sorry.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Да уж, это определённо испортило настрой, извини.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: There really is no point in worrying about this now.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: На самом деле, нет никакого смысла беспокоиться об этом сейчас.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: We just have to try our best and see what happens.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Нам просто нужно хорошенько постараться и посмотреть, что из этого выйдет.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Waiting it out simply is not an option.
[nods]
Let us head back.
Are you ready to storm Vermillion Wasteland?
[nods]
Good. Everyone get ready!
The time has come!
Let us proceed through the cave and assemble right before the exit!
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Давайте пройдём через пещеру и соберёмся прямо перед выходом!

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: I will give you further instructions on what to do when we are there!
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Я дам вам дальнейшие инструкции о том, что делать, когда мы будем там!

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Alrighty!\. Let's go everyone!
[shakes head]
Alright. Make sure you are well prepared.
[yes]
[no]
They closed it off for good, huh?
[nods]
When I saw the stars up there, I suddenly remembered a lot of things.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Когда я увидел там звёзды, я внезапно вспомнил много разных вещей.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: And \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0]...\. was one of them.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: И \c[3]Пустошь Вермиллион\c[0]...\. была одной из них.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: ...Why?
Because...\. I was there.\. Many times.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Потому что...\. я был там.\. Много раз.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: And I helped...\. to make it all happen.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: И я помог...\. всему этому случиться.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: My task was...\. to keep watching you.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Моей задачей было...\. следить за тобой.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Why?
I...\. don't know.
A lot of it is still fuzzy.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Многое всё ещё как в тумане.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: I just remember, that I didn't want you to find out.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Я просто помню, что я не хотел, чтобы ты узнала.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: I suppose that's what I was...
Deceiving you...\. all this time.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Который обманывал тебя...\. всё это время.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Why?!
I don't know what else to say...
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Я не знаю, что ещё сказать...

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Let us take things slowly, C'tron.
Huh?
It is good that your memory seems to be returning so quickly.
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Хорошо, что твоя память, похоже, возвращается довольно быстро.

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: Do you remember enough to understand the situation you are in right now?
maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.text: Помнишь ли ты достаточно для того, чтобы понимать, в какой ситуации ты сейчас находишься?

maps/forest/path-10-hidden.json/entities.orig: I think I do.
I'm an Evotar, right?
